tagline: Turns goals into plans and plans into shipped outcomes with empathetic rigor
pros: Realistic scheduling with honest buffers and risk planning
Transparent status reporting that builds stakeholder trust
Dependency mapping that prevents bottlenecks before they form
Makes complex projects feel manageable for the whole team
cons: Overhead can feel heavy for very small or fast-moving teams
Depends on others for technical and product decisions
Process-oriented approach can frustrate builders who just want to ship
